direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve asset transfer operations, though for different purposes (dust conversion vs. withdrawal).
Both methods access and manipulate asset-related data, though for different operations (dust conversion vs. deposit history).
Both methods involve asset transfers, though dustTransfer specifically converts dust assets to BNB.
Both methods handle asset-related operations and may encounter similar exceptions related to asset availability or network issues.

enhanced_by.reason: Both dustTransfer and other asset-related methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized.
Before performing dustTransfer, it is necessary to ensure the availability of the assets to be converted.
After dustTransfer, it is crucial to verify that the conversion was successful and handle any potential errors.
